@latvians wrote:

I need a command which sell a whip and gives for it 2mils in 508 server
then i figured out when it can bee like this
i figured out when it can look like this

} else if(cmd[0].equals(“sellwhip”)) {
if(Engine.playerItems.HasItemAmount(p, 4151, 1) == true)
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p,4151, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(p, 4151), 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 1000000 );
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "U sell ur whip and gain 1mil coins ");
